title: Trump: ‘I respect every one’ of the Democrats running
text:
President Trump, speaking to reporters outside the White House about an hour before the third Democratic primary debate was set to start, was asked if there were any candidates who would be appearing onstage he actually respected.

“I respect all of them,” Trump responded.

“All of them?” the reporter asked.

“I respect every one,” Trump said. “Let me tell you: It takes a lot of courage to run for office. I respect all of them.”

The president then pointed at the reporter and added: “See that? I’m getting much better as a politician. You never thought you’d hear that answer.”
description: President Trump, speaking to reporters outside the White House about an hour before the third Democratic primary debate was set to start, was asked if there were any candidates who would be appearing onstage he actually respected.
